en.phrase: What kind of hotel is that?
en.translation: Wat voor soort hotel is dat?
en.subject: questions

en.phrase: Could you point that out to me?
en.subject: questions

en.phrase: Could you come with me, please?
en.translation: Kunt u met me meegaan, a.u.b.?
en.subject: questions

en.phrase: Could you reserve some tickets for me, please?
en.translation: Wilt u voor mij kaartjes reserveren, a.u.b.?
en.subject: questions

en.phrase: Do you know another hotel, please?
en.translation: Weet u misschien een ander hotel?
en.subject: questions

en.phrase: Do you have a ... for me?
en.subject: questions

en.phrase: Do you have a vegetarian dish, please?
en.translation: Hebt u misschien een gerecht zonder vlees?
en.subject: questions

en.phrase: I'd like a kilo of apples, please
en.translation: Ik wil graag een kilo appels
en.subject: questions

en.phrase: Yes, what can I do for you?
en.translation: Ja, wat kan ik voor u doen?
en.subject: answers

en.phrase: No, I don't have time now
en.translation: Nee, ik heb nu geen tijd
en.subject: answers

en.translation: Dat ben ik (niet) met u eens
en.subject: answers

en.translation: verboden op het gras te lopen
en.subject: signs

en.phrase: The day before yesterday was Friday

en.phrase: What time can I come round?

en.phrase: In a quarter of an hour
en.subject: date-time

en.phrase: In three quarters of an hour
en.subject: date-time

en.translation: vier gedeeld door twee is twee
en.subject: numbers

en.translation: De groep bestaat uit drie personen
en.subject: numbers

en.phrase: Where can I find a bank/an exchange office around here?
en.translation: Waar is hier ergens een bank/een wisselkantoor?
en.subject: bank

en.phrase: Can I use my cash card here?
en.subject: bank

en.phrase: Can I withdraw money on my credit card here?
en.translation: Kan ik hier met een creditcard geld opnemen?
en.subject: bank

en.phrase: How much commission do I have to pay?
en.subject: bank

en.phrase: Could I have smaller notes, please?
en.subject: bank

en.phrase: Where is there a cash dispenser around here?
en.subject: bank

en.phrase: Can I take out less than that?
en.subject: bank

en.phrase: These are the details of my bank in Holland/Belgium
en.translation: Dit zijn de gegevens van mijn bank in Nederland/België
en.subject: bank

en.phrase: This is my bank account/girobank number
en.subject: bank

en.phrase: I'd like to change some money
en.subject: bank

en.phrase: Could you give me some small change with it?
en.translation: Kunt u me ook wat kleingeld geven?
en.subject: bank

en.phrase: Could I see your passport, please?
en.subject: bank

en.phrase: Could I see some identification, please?
en.subject: bank

en.phrase: Could I see your bank pass, please?
en.subject: bank

en.phrase: Could you tell me where I can find a post office around here?
en.translation: Ik ben op zoek naar een postkantoor
en.subject: post

en.phrase: Could you tell me where I can find a postbox around here?
en.translation: Is hier een brievenbus in de buurt?
en.subject: post

en.phrase: Which counter should I go to to change money?
en.translation: Bij welk loket kan ik geld wisselen?
en.subject: post

en.phrase: Which counter should I go to for a Telegraph Money Order?
en.translation: Moet ik hier zijn voor een telefonische overboeking?
en.subject: post

en.phrase: Is there any mail for me? My name's ...
en.translation: Is er post voor mij? Mijn naam is ...
en.subject: post

en.phrase: What's the postage for a ... to ... ?
en.translation: Hoeveel moet er op een ... naar ... ?
en.subject: post

en.phrase: Are there enough stamps on it?
en.translation: Zit er genoeg aan postzegels op?
en.subject: post

en.phrase: I'd like to send this parcel by special delivery
en.translation: Ik wil dit pakket per expresse versturen
en.subject: post

en.phrase: I'd like to send this picture postcard by air mail
en.translation: Ik wil deze ansichtkaart per luchtpost versturen
en.subject: post

en.phrase: I'd like to send this letter by registered mail
en.translation: Ik wil deze brief aangetekend versturen
en.subject: post

en.phrase: Do you have a photocopier/fax machine here?
en.subject: post

en.phrase: How much is it per page?
en.subject: post

en.phrase: Is there a phone box around here?
en.translation: Is hier ergens een telefooncel in de buurt?
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Is there a coin box around here?
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Could I use your phone, please?
en.translation: Mag ik van uw telefoon gebruikmaken?
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Can I charge my mobile here?
en.translation: Mag ik mijn mobiele telefoon hier even opladen?
en.subject: telephone

en.translation: Hebt u een telefoonoplader te leen?
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Is there bluetooth on your mobile?
en.translation: Heb je bluetooth op je telefoon?
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: How do I synchronize my mobile via bluetooth?
en.translation: Hoe synchroniseer ik mijn telefoon via bluetooth?
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Do you have a(n) ... phone directory ofthe city .../the district ...?
en.translation: Hebt u een telefoongids van de stad .../de streek ...?
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Where can I get a phone card/pre-paid card?
en.translation: Waar kan ik een telefoonkaart/prepaidkaart kopen?
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Could you give me the number for international directory enquiries?
en.translation: Kunt u me helpen aan het nummer van informatie buitenland?
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Could you give me the number of room ...?
en.translation: Kunt u mij het nummer van kamer ... geven?
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Could you give me the international access code?
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Could you give me the country code for ...?
en.translation: Kunt u me helpen aan het landnummer van ...?
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Could you give me the trunk code for ...?
en.translation: Ik ben op zoek naar het kengetal van ...
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Could you give me the number of ...?
en.translation: Kunt u me helpen aan het abonneenummer van ...?
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Could you check if this number's correct?
en.translation: Kunt u nagaan of dit nummer correct is?
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Do I have to press '0' first?
en.translation: Moet ik eerst een nul toetsen?
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Could you dial this number for me, please?
en.translation: Wilt u het volgende nummer voor me bellen?
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Could you put me through to .../extension ... please?
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: I'd like to place a reverse-charge call to ...
en.translation: Ik wil graag een collect call met ...
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Have there been any calls for me?
en.translation: Heeft er iemand voor mij gebeld?
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: I'm sorry, I've made a mistake
en.translation: Sorry, ik heb het verkeerde nummer getoetst
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Is there somebody who speaks Dutch?
en.translation: Is er iemand die Nederlands spreekt?
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Could you ask him/her to call me back?
en.translation: Wilt u vragen of hij/zij me terugbelt?
en.subject: telephone

en.translation: Mijn naam is ... Mijn nummer is ...
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Could you tell him/her I called?
en.translation: Wilt u zeggen dat ik gebeld heb?
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: There's a phone call for you
en.subject: telephone

en.translation: U moet eerst een nul toetsen
en.subject: telephone

en.translation: Hij/zij is op het ogenblik niet aanwezig
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: This is the answering machine of ...
en.translation: Dit is het automatisch antwoordapparaat van ...
en.subject: telephone

en.phrase: Where can I get access to the internet?
en.translation: Waar kan ik toegang tot internet krijgen?
en.subject: internet

en.phrase: What is the password to get on the internet?
en.translation: Wat is het wachtwoord om internetverbinding te krijgen?
en.subject: internet

en.phrase: Where can I open my e-mail?
en.translation: Waar kan ik mijn e-mail bekijken?
en.subject: internet

en.phrase: How much is the use of a computer per half hour/hour?
en.translation: Hoeveel kost het gebruik van een computer per halfuur/uur?
en.subject: internet

en.phrase: Have you got a memory card for this camera?
en.translation: Ik ben op zoek naar een geheugenkaart voor deze camera
en.subject: photo-video

en.phrase: I'd like a memory card of ... MB/GB
en.translation: Ik wil graag een geheugenkaart van ... MB/GB
en.subject: photo-video

en.phrase: How many pictures can I take with this memory card?
en.translation: Hoeveel foto's kan ik met deze geheugenkaart maken?
en.subject: photo-video

en.phrase: Can I have a new battery for this camera, please?
en.translation: Ik wil graag een nieuwe accu voor deze camera
en.subject: photo-video

en.phrase: Have you got mini-DV-tapes/dvd's for this camera?
en.translation: Ik ben op zoek naar mini-DV-tapes/dvd's voor deze camera
en.subject: photo-video

en.phrase: I'd like to have a battery charger
en.subject: photo-video

en.phrase: I'd like to have some passport photos taken
en.translation: Ik wil graag pasfoto's laten maken
en.subject: photo-video

en.phrase: My camera is not working, can you repair it, please?
en.translation: Mijn camera doet het niet, kunt u hem repareren?
en.subject: photo-video

en.phrase: The memory card is stuck, could you get it out for me, please?
en.translation: De geheugenkaart zit vast, kunt u hem er voor mij uithalen?
en.subject: photo-video

en.phrase: Hoe lang gaat de reparatie duren?
en.translation: How long is it going to take to repair?
en.subject: photo-video

en.phrase: I'd like to have prints made of digital files
en.translation: Ik wil afdrukken maken van digitale bestanden
en.subject: photo-video

en.phrase: I'd like to store photos on a cd/dvd
en.translation: Ik wil graag foto's op een cd/dvd zetten
en.subject: photo-video

en.phrase: Could you transfer the photos on my camera to this USB-stick?
en.translation: Kunt u de foto's van mijn camera op deze USB-stick zetten?
en.subject: photo-video

en.phrase: I'd like ... prints from each negative
en.translation: Kunt u ... afdrukken van elke foto voor me maken?
en.subject: photo-video

en.phrase: I'd like to have this photo enlarged
en.translation: Ik wil deze foto laten vergroten
en.subject: photo-video

en.phrase: Is the weather going to be good/bad?
en.subject: weather

en.phrase: How many degrees is it going to be?
en.subject: weather

en.phrase: Is there going to be a storm?
en.subject: weather

en.phrase: Is it going to snow tomorrow?
en.subject: weather

en.phrase: Is there going to be afrost?
en.translation: Verwacht u dat het gaat vriezen?
en.subject: weather

en.phrase: Is it going to be foggy?
en.subject: weather

en.phrase: Is there going to be a thunderstorm?
en.subject: weather

en.phrase: What's the weather going to be like today/tomorrow?
en.translation: Wat voor weer wordt het vandaag/morgen?
en.subject: weather

en.phrase: Is it going to stay like this?
en.subject: weather

en.phrase: Has the weather been like this for long here?
en.translation: Is het hier allang zulk weer?
en.subject: weather

en.phrase: Is it always this hot/cold here?
en.translation: Is het hier altijd zo warm/koud?
en.subject: weather

en.phrase: Is it always this dry/wet here?
en.translation: Is het hier altijd zo droog/nat?
en.subject: weather

en.phrase: Is it safe to visit that area?
en.translation: Is dat een veilige wijk om te bezoeken?
en.subject: safety

en.phrase: Can a woman go there unaccompanied?
en.translation: Kan ik daar als vrouw alleen naartoe?
en.subject: safety

en.phrase: Is it safe to go out at night here?
en.translation: Kan ik hier 's avonds veilig over straat?
en.subject: safety

en.phrase: There's no train service today because of a suspicious package
en.translation: De treinen rijden niet vanwege een verdacht pakketje
en.subject: safety

en.phrase: The hotel will be evacuated because of a bomb scare
en.translation: Het hotel wordt ontruimd vanwege een bommelding
en.subject: safety

en.phrase: Are there dangerous wild animals about?
en.subject: safety

en.phrase: Do you often get earthquakes/volcanic eruptions here?
en.subject: safety

en.phrase: Is there a risk of a flood or an avalanche?
en.translation: Is er kans op een overstroming/lawine?
en.subject: safety

en.phrase: Is it safe to thumb a lift here?
en.translation: Kan ik in deze omgeving veilig liften?
en.subject: safety

en.phrase: Is this a safe camping area?
en.translation: Is het hier veilig om te kamperen?
en.subject: safety

en.phrase: Do we have to take special precautions?
en.translation: Moeten we nog bepaalde voorzorgsmaatregelen nemen?
en.subject: safety
